text:
Bee Cheng Hiang at Changi Airport T4 is the perfect stop for anyone looking to bring home a taste of Singapore! Conveniently located in the Departure Hall, this outlet offers a great selection of their famous bak kwa (barbecued pork) and other delicious meat snacks that make fantastic souvenirs or travel treats.

The bak kwa here is freshly grilled and smells absolutely mouth-watering. Each slice is tender, flavorful, and has that perfect balance of sweet and savory with a smoky char. They also offer vacuum-sealed packs, which are ideal for travel and keep the flavors intact for a longer time.

The staff at this location are friendly and efficient, helping you pick out your preferred flavors and packages quickly so you can get on with your journey. They even offer samples, allowing you to taste before buying, which is a nice touch.

If you’re at Changi T4 and looking for a delicious, uniquely Singaporean snack to take home, Bee Cheng Hiang is a must-visit. It’s a taste of Singapore packed with quality and tradition—a perfect gift or treat to remind you of your trip. Highly recommended for all travelers!
Nice! I thought I can't buy bak kwa from the airport, good thing this store is there.
Its located inside the departing area @gate 12. Offering 1 for 6 boxes. Nice for gifting.

My bakkwa is so dry and chaota... How do I share with my relatives this upcoming CNY??? Get better people who can barbeque properly because u r ruining MY CNY!!!!!!!!!! I wish I could have taken picture of the bakkwa to put it up here but it was kinda discarded. This CNY, I gonna buy from Fragrance.
Wait to go through immigration before buying at the other bee Chen hiang store inside. Prices in the other store will be net of gst. Don't need to waste time trying to get a gst refund.
